importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The date of the article's publication, marking when Ange Postecoglou was officially fired by Nottingham Forest following a 3-0 defeat to Chelsea.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The timeframe of Postecoglou's dismissal, highlighting the unprecedented speed of the managerial change—just 39 days after appointment.

keyTakeAways: Ange Postecoglou was dismissed by Nottingham Forest after only 39 days as manager, making it the fastest exit in Premier League history.
Postecoglou failed to win any games during his tenure, drawing two and losing six, including a 3-0 defeat to Chelsea.
The club's statement cited 'disappointing results and performances' as the reason for his dismissal.
Postecoglou joined after Nuno Espírito Santo, who had led the club to its best finish in 30 years (seventh place in 2024/25).
The departure of Postecoglou, who was booed by fans, marks Nottingham Forest’s third managerial change in the season.
The Australian manager's exit is notable because it is the fastest in Premier League history, beating Les Reed’s record by one day.
Sam Allardyce is noted as the only permanent manager to have had a shorter tenure, though he left by mutual consent.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Ange Postecoglou, the Australian football manager, was dismissed by Nottingham Forest just 39 days after being appointed, following a poor start to the season that included zero wins, two draws, and six losses—most notably a 3-0 defeat to Chelsea. This marks the fastest managerial exit in Premier League history, beating Les Reed's record by one day. The club, which had recently seen success under Nuno Espírito Santo, now faces its third managerial change in the season. The dismissal is attributed to disappointing results and performance, with fans booing Postecoglou at the final match, and the club's ownership structure, including owner Evangelos Marinakis, previously influencing managerial decisions.
title: Ange Postecoglou Fired by Nottingham Forest After Just 39 Days
